DOC.brief_summary: Previous study iron absorption focus effect addition iron absorption enhancer like ascorbic acid EDTA meal recently enzymatic phytic acid removal phytase . The investigator want investigate effect fat iron absorption without addition exogenous phytase potential iron absorption enhancer lipid nutrient supplement ( LNS ) product compare micronutrient powder ( MNP ) product . Furthermore investigator evaluate effect Lipids- iron absorption induce ileal brake ingestion fat emulsion prior meal . Increasing caloric density meal increase fat content might enhance iron absorption delay gastric emptying , gastric acid secretion increase Fe stomach residence time .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effects Exogenous Phytase Iron Absorption From LNS Added Complementary Foods
DOC.criteria: Reproductive age female 1845 year Normal body mass index ( 17.525 kg/m2 ) No intake mineral/vitamin supplement 2 week study No metabolic gastrointestinal disorder No food allergies chronic disorder eat disorder assess selfreport Having receive full oral write information aim procedure study Willing comply study procedure Having provide oral write informed consent Regular intake medication ( except oral contraceptive ) Blood donation significant blood loss ( accident , surgery ) past 4 month Currently participate another clinical trial participate another clinical trial last 30 day prior begin study Former participation study involve administration iron stable isotope Subject expect comply study protocol Pregnancy lactation
